1.title: Pilot
1.plot: In the pilot episode, we are introduced to the various characters and their issues and backgrounds.

imdb.plot outline: Phat Fyterz (PFZ) is a TV series centering around the life of 4 women living in London. They are from different walks of life, have a varied set of relationship/career/family issues. A set of seemingly random circumstances brings them to join PFZ. The tone of the show is serious but has a healthy sprinkle of comedy to keep it dynamic and fun. PFZ is a fictional support group run by the NHS. It provides counseling and training for service users to deal with issues such as: self-confidence, weight loss, depression, PTSD and other ailments. Each character joins the group for different reasons and are forced to, at first, co-operate with each other and hopefully befriend each other while going to PFZ meetings and dealing with challenges on their own in their professional and personal lives.
